sentence.Network_en: Julia was a very tough, sharp-tongued woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 朱莉娅是一个非常粗野、说话刻薄的女子。

sentence.Network_en: The sweet witty soul of Ovid lives in mellifluous and honey - tongued Shakespeare.
sentence.Network_cn: 奥维德的风雅机智的灵魂活在语言甜美流畅的莎士比亚身上.

sentence.Network_en: He had a sharp - tongued, nagging stepmother.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的继母说话尖刻, 唠叨不休.

绕口令(Tongue Twister)是一种语言游戏.学说英语绕口令, 无论从练习口齿的伶俐性还是了解英语语言的特点来说,都是一个极好的素材.

means.word_mean: 1. provided with or resembling a tongue; often used in combination;
2. having a manner of speaking as specified; often used in combination;
